ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Redshifted photoelectric absorption with low energy window. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: A redshifted photoelectric absorption using Balucinska-Church and McCammon (ApJ 400, 699) cross-sections. The relative abundances are set by the set_xsabund command.
where sigma(E) is the photo-electric cross-section, NOT including Thomson scattering.
This is a multiplicative model component.

ROW.DATA: equivalent hydrogen column (in units of 10^22 atoms/cm^2)

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.

BUGS.PARA: For a list of known bugs and issues with the XSPEC models, please visit the XSPEC bugs page.
